document_title: Colon cancer: Causes, signs and treatment
subsection_content: The later the detection and treatment at a later stage, the lower the prognosis for effective treatment and longer survival in the patient. Cancer in the early stages often progresses more slowly, and if detected and treated early, the prognosis is good. The 5-year survival rate for treatment by stage is as follows: Stage I is about over 90%, stage II is about 80 - 83%, stage III is about 60% and stage IV is very low. , only 11%.
subsection_title: ung thu dai trang.json. Can colon cancer be cured?
subsection_data:
ung thu dai trang.json. Can colon cancer be cured?
The later the detection and treatment at a later stage, the lower the prognosis for effective treatment and longer survival in the patient. Cancer in the early stages often progresses more slowly, and if detected and treated early, the prognosis is good. The 5-year survival rate for treatment by stage is as follows: Stage I is about over 90%, stage II is about 80 - 83%, stage III is about 60% and stage IV is very low. , only 11%.
